description:
Learn how to beat insomnia with the power of self hypnosis.

This course will teach you:

  • What hypnosis is
  • What self hypnosis is
  • How you can measure your progress and success
  • How to prepare for experiencing self hypnosis
  • Why self hypnosis is useful to help you overcome insomnia
  • How often you should use the self hypnosis track to help you overcome insomnia
  • Powerful, effective non-hypnosis techniques for helping you overcome insomnia


Included in this course is a brief guided self hypnosis session so that you can find out what entering hypnosis is like for you, it also gives you an opportunity to decide whether Dan Jones approach to hypnosis fits with how you like to be hypnotised.

As well as having a video lecture of the self hypnosis for overcoming insomnia session, there is also an included downloadable mp3 audio version so that you can listen to the self hypnosis to overcome insomnia session more comfortably when you are falling asleep at night.

The course is structured to give you an understand of hypnosis and self hypnosis and how you can measure your success and progress before moving on to doing the hypnosis, and giving you additional ideas and techniques you can use to improve your sleep and overcome insomnia.

The course will take about an hour and a half to complete, but you will be likely to use the self hypnosis mp3 frequently over the coming weeks and months, and you may wish to come back to review and practice the additional techniques regularly until you have mastered them.

This course is for those interested in overcoming insomnia. It is also useful for newly qualified counsellors, NLP practitioners, stress management consultants and hypnotherapists that want to take additional learning around helping clients overcome insomnia.
title: Overcome Insomnia With Self Hypnosis
